DOC.brief_title: Treating Nicotine Dependence Schizophrenic Individuals : Effectiveness Bupropion - 1
DOC.detailed_description: Past research use NTP , atypical antipsychotic , bupropion schizophrenic individual aid smoke cessation encouraging . The purpose study compare bupropion SR placebo determine effectiveness use combination NTP help schizophrenic individual quit smoking . Participants double-blind , placebo-controlled study randomly assign receive either NTP ( 21 mg/day ) placebo NTP bupropion SR ( 300 mg/day ) . Participants begin take one pill day bupropion SR ( 150 mg/day ) placebo start second week study . After three day , dose bupropion SR placebo increase 2 pill day . Participants continue dose regimen end Week 10 . Throughout 10-week study , participant receive weekly group therapy .
